SELECT a.*,b.ParSingleName,d.ProdNameC,c.InQuan as 'InQuanDetail',c.ItemNO,e.Name FROM MatInHead a LEFT JOIN Custom b on a.SupplyerCode = b.ParComID LEFT JOIN MatInDetail c on a.MatInNO = c.MatInNO LEFT JOIN Materical d on c.ProdCode = d.prodcode LEFT JOIN Store e ON a.StoreCode = e.Code
a.MatInNO = #{params.matInNo}

SELECT a.*,b.Name,c.Name as 'StoreName', d.ItemNo,d.OutQuan as 'OutQuanDetail',e.ProdNameC FROM MatOutHead a LEFT JOIN Store b ON a.DeptCode = b.Code LEFT JOIN Store c ON a.StoreCode = c.Code LEFT JOIN MatOutDetail d ON a.MatOutNO = d.MatOutNO LEFT JOIN Materical e ON d.ProdCode = e.prodcode
a.MatOutNO = #{params.matOutNo}
